name: lucky-punch
effect: Held by Chansey: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Chansey’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An item to be held by CHANSEY. It is a pair of gloves that boosts CHANSEY’s critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by CHANSEY. It is a pair of gloves that boosts CHANSEY’s critical-hit ratio.
